title: Can't Help Falling In Love
lyrics:
Wise men say, only fools rush in
But I can't help falling in love with you
Shall I stay
Would it be a sin
If I can't help falling in love with you



Like a river flows, Gently to the sea

Darlin so we go, somethings were meant to be

So take my hand, take my whole life too

Fore I can't help fallin in love with you



Like a river flows, Gently to the sea

Darlin so we know, somethings were meant to be

So take my hand, take my whole life too

Fore I can't help fallin in love with you

Fore I can't help fallin in love with you
